tool_description: Adjusts caloric requirements based on medical conditions, medications, and health status that affect metabolism.
error_messages: Too many health conditions: Maximum 10 conditions allowed
Too many medications: Maximum 15 medications allowed
Invalid recovery status: Use one of [healthy, recovering, chronic, critical]
Body condition score out of range: Scores must be 1-9
Target body condition invalid: Target must be 1-9
usage: Provide health_conditions array and body_condition_score. Optionally include medications, recovery_status, target_body_condition, and veterinary_recommendation for comprehensive health-based adjustments.

dietary_restrictions.description: List of dietary restrictions based on health conditions

monitoring_frequency.description: Recommended frequency for weight and condition monitoring
